plugins.name: deep-red-style
plugins.description: Creates webpages with a deep red/orange atmospheric aesthetic featuring dark backgrounds (#050505), vibrant red/orange accents (#FF4500), atmospheric gradients, elegant serif typography (Playfair Display), and complex scroll-triggered animations with floating parallax cards and dot-grid backgrounds. Use when the user wants a dramatic, high-end, dark-themed landing page with red or orange color scheme.
